casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Terence Mitchell BRUCE, Defendant-Appellee. People of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Stanley Lyle Nicholson, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 156827, SC: 156828
COA: 331232, COA: 331233 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 20, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendants-appellees to extend the time for filing their brief is GRANTED. The brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 15, 2018.
